Comparison of job loss numbers: The expert compared the number of jobs in Georgia before and after the stimulus was passed to verify the claim. The data from the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics showed a decrease of slightly more than 124,000 workers, supporting the claim.
Comparison of unemployment rates: The expert also compared the unemployment rate in Georgia before and after the stimulus. The data from the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics showed an increase from 8.7 percent to 10 percent, confirming the claim.
Corroboration by Republican National Com: The expert mentioned that the claim was made by the Republican National Committee spokeswoman Amanda Henneberg. The fact that the claim was endorsed by a political party adds credibility to the authenticity of the claim.
Expert opinion on stimulus impact: The expert included the opinions of economists who stated that while the job losses and unemployment rates may have increased, the stimulus helped counter the lack of growth in the private sector. This additional perspective provides a more comprehensive understanding of the claim and its implications.
